copy_toast_desc: The address was copied to clipboard.
status_approved_tooltip: The return has been approved. The customer can return the product.
status_transit_tooltip: The product(s)/return has been sent by customer.
status_received_tooltip: The product has been received at the warehouse.
status_refunded_tooltip: The refund has been successfully processed.
status_rejected_tooltip: The request was rejected. It does not comply with the return policy.
status_cancelled_tooltip: The request was canceled by the customer or by the company.
confirm_status_change: Are you sure to change the status to '{{status}}'?
status_changed_to: The return is now in status '{{status}}'.
title: Account Information

access.title: Options for Accessing the Returns Page
access.credit: Order number + Last 4 digits of the credit card used

user.title: User Management
user.name: Name
user.delete_confirm: Are you sure you want to delete this user?

reasons.size_desc: The product had been sent in a wrong size or model.
reasons.defect_desc: Manufacturing defects, shipping damage or doesn't work properly.
reasons.not_expected_desc: Doesn't look or function as the customer expected (e.g. color, size, or quality).

address_info.title: Addresses
address_info.intro: In this section, you can configure the following addresses:
address_info.sender_desc: The address that will appear on the shipping label.
address_info.receiver_desc: The address where the package will be sent.
address_info.notification_desc: The address that will be shown in the email notifications sent to customers.

shipping.description: in this section you can add and configurate the dispatchers, you can add national and international dispatchers

emailTracking.title: Email Templates
emailTracking.description: Configure the email address from which the emails will be sent and the recipients in blind carbon copy.

placeholdersInfo.title: Did you know you can add order data to your message?
placeholdersInfo.description: In the subject and body you can use the following placeholders that will be replaced by actual order data.

validation.emptySubject: The subject cannot be empty for the template
validation.emptyContent: The content cannot be empty for the template

account.title_2: 2. Options for accessing the returns page.
account.title_4: 4. How to add the logo to your brand
account.info_intro: You can update the following info:
account.change_password: You can also change your password here.
account.verify_email: If you change your email address, you will need to verify it again.
account.logout_email: If you change your email address, you will be logged out and will need to log in again with the new email.
account.how_update: How can I update the information? Click on the “Edit” button, make the desired changes and save them.
account.auth_intro: Define how your customers can authenticate themselves to access the returns page and register a return.
account.auth_options: You can select one or more of the following combinations:
account.option_id: Order number + ID card number (strictest verification)
account.switches: Activate or deactivate the options using the switches.
account.only_one: Only one option can be activated.
account.user_intro: Here you can manage the users who have access to Retoure24 in your company.
account.user_actions: Available actions: ✏️ Edit user  🗑️ Delete user
account.add_user: To add a new user, click on the “Add new user” button.
account.logo_intro: Here you can upload your company logo.
account.logo_format: Upload an image file in JPG or PNG format.
account.logo_note: The logo will be displayed at the top of the emails sent to your customers.

address.title_1: 1. How do I add a new address?
address.title_2: 2. How do I edit an address?
address.step_1: Click on the “+ Add new address” button.
address.step_3: Save to make the address available in the system.
address.edit_intro: To edit one of the configured addresses:
address.edit_1: Find the map of the address you want to edit.
address.edit_3: Update the necessary data and save the changes.
address.warning: Important: Existing addresses are not deleted. Addresses can only be edited or deactivated/activated, but not deleted.

contact.title: Do you still have a question?
contact.subtitle: If you didn’t find an answer in our FAQ, feel free to contact us. We’ll respond as soon as possible!
contact.phone_desc: We are always happy to help you!
contact.email_desc: The best way to get a quick response!
